title: Hill-side and border sketches:
author: Maxwell, W. H.
snippet: Beside  exclusive right of hunting over their own grounds, William the Linn gave the prior and his monks Greenwood, Reston, Brockholewood, Akeside, Kirkdeanwood, Harewood, Deanwood, Houndwood, with all their groves, wastes, &c. &,c., to sport over.
